text: Map showing the former Byumba Province in Rwanda Byumba Province was one of the 12 former provinces (intara) of Rwanda and was situated in the north of the country, sharing a border with Uganda. It had an area of some and its population was estimated at 782,427 (2002 figures) prior to its dissolution in January 2006. ==External links== * Rwandagateway.org Category:Former provinces of Rwanda Category:States and territories disestablished in 2006
title: Byumba Province
